articles.title: Asian Stocks Tumble as Worry on US Economy Sinks Tech Shares - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: (Bloomberg) -- Asian equities slumped at the start of the new week, weighed down by losses in technology stocks on concerns over US economic growth.Most Read...
